resources.string: This quiz is a programming exercise! \n\nTo find the best contraception method for you please read more online, and most importantly consult with your doctor.
Are you looking for a contraception method that protects against STDs/STIs?
Are you looking for a non-hormonal or hormonal contraception method?
Do you or your family have a history of blood clots?
Do you experience pain or heavy flow while menstruating?
Do you plan to conceive in the very near future?
Are you over the age of 35 and smoke regularly?
Do you have a fixed daily routine?
Do you tend to be forgetful?
For final answer please answer all the questions.
For more information about different contraception methods click on the links below:
For more information, please click the links below!
